name: Gambling Addict
description:
A game about a person that can't stop gambling and everyday he tries to win money by gambling! You have to be lucky and stop gambling at the right moment so you can pay food and  your taxes everyday. Good Luck because you will really need it :).

Controls :

- Space / Click Lever = Pull Lever

This game was made in 4 days for The 2021 Community Jam. I hope you will like my game!
